title: Princess Gives It Away
description: Free Short Story Two years in amazon top 100 Kindle eBooks > Literature & Fiction > Humor & Satire > Literary Humor You know how it goes you finish school. Start your career. Help your friends. Find the girl of your dreams get married. Then happily ever after... OR Five years in you stumble across the fact she is cheating on you and you plan your revenge.  A story of how a man finds out his wife is cheating on him and the way he enacts his revenge. Lots of humor and no descriptive sex but very adult themed. one comment by Anonymous It was filled with the stuff of humor and revenge. Click now and get some revenge FREE
author: Dab10
